reviews.text: I needed to stay here two nights at the last minute and ended up booking for $77 a night at hotels.com. What a deal! This is a three star property that is well maintained and provides excellent service that you don't often find in a hotel with a higher price point. Free wi-fi for example. The room was decent sized and very clean. The breakfast was good with a nice variety of options. The staff all went out of their way to say hello or good morning. The other hotels in this area are hilton garden inn, marriott, etc and I can't see paying around $40 a night more for these when this place has it all.
reviews.title: Surprisingly nice, surprisingly affordable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We been making 3 - 4 trips yearly these past years and have always stayed elsewhere thinking in the price range every accommodation was going to be pretty much the same. Boy were we wrong! Not a single thing about the Best Western Plus Oakbrook is the same as the others we've stayed in over the years. The service from the moment we called to make a reservation and throughout our stay was above and beyond anything we've experienced. Tina the Manager during our visit was cordial and incredibly aware of any and all aspects of making our stay as comfortable as possible. The entire staff worked hard in our service. (The omelette lady particularly went out of her way for us.)
reviews.title: Hidden Gem in Oakbrook Illinois

reviews.text: The room itself was ultra clean and comfortable, the king sized bed was gorgeous and inviting a place to sleep as I've experienced at a hotel in this price range! The appointments within the room were all new and well taken care of. The furniture was up scale and complemented the wonderful lighting. Both the bathroom and breezeway were spotless and well equipped. The towels were plush and had that amazing spring fresh smell. We really appreciated the extra attention obviously given to these areas. Over all I believe you can't duplicate this experience in the western suburban area of Chicago without spending several hundred dollars more.
reviews.title: Westmont, Il Business Trip

reviews.text: We make 3 -4 trips yearly to this area and will be staying at the Best Western Plus Oakbrook each and every-time. We've experienced pretty much all the hotels in this area over the years and nothing came close to this visit, ever. It truly is a hidden gem for any weary traveler. We can't recommend it enough without hesitation, knowing any visitor they accommodate is in the very best hands. Thank You so much and don't hesitate to reserve a room with Best Western Plus Oakbrook. They are centrally located so we enjoyed easy access to our beloved downtown Chicago, the northern suburbs are mere minutes away as are the west and far western suburbs. It is so easy to get about anywhere in Chicagoland from here as they are mere minutes from all major expressways.
reviews.title: Fabuluse, comfort,staff was wonderful, like home.

The staff was great, especially kelly, all were super nice. Quiet if u are their on business they care about your stay while ur their, they will do what they can ,to make your stay pleasant. Very clean, in all areas. This best western is another # 10.

reviews.text: I stayed at the Best Western Plus, Oakbrook earlier in the fall of 2012 and have stayed there more than 7 times with a total of 24 evenings since and each time I stay the service and quality is as good as the first experience. In fact, the staff has been very helpful and friendly every single time and made an effort to make me feel 'at home'.
reviews.title: Consistently good experience!

reviews.title: Best Service!

reviews.text: I will stay here, whenever I am in the vicinity . The staff Kelly , Diane , Tina and Oralia were great !!! Great value !!!
reviews.title: Great place!

reviews.text: I had an overnight in this month, and it was a very pleasant experience. Everything was clean and comfortable. The shower worked well with plenty of water pressure and heat -- very important! The towels were plushy too. The bed was not typical of uncomfortable hotel mattresses; this one was thick and comfortable. The staff were eager to help and very polite. The breakfast was more than enough. This hotel was a real bargain considering the Chicago area, time of year, and all that went with our visit.
reviews.title: Will stay here again

reviews.text: We stayed here back in May to attend a graduation. We were in town for just a day but had such a good experience from our last stay; we made plans to stay here again. Check in was fast and our original room reservation was for a non-smoking room. Somehow the desk clerk gave us the honeymoon suite but, it was a Smoking room! The smell of smoke was still lingering in the room!! We went back to the front desk and got the room changed. This new room was much better, clean and no smoke smell. Other good points were: lots of hot water in the shower and the bed was comfortable. Overall a pleasant stay and will stay here again when back in Chicago.
reviews.title: Return stay at BW Plus Oakbrook Inn

reviews.text: This is a nice, clean, safe place to stay. It is very homey and the staff both at check in and check out are really nice. I did not eat breakfast, swim or use the fitness center, so cannot comment on that, but I would for sure stay here again.
reviews.title: Nice place to stay

reviews.text: This was a wonderful place to stay. My party was very pleased with everything about it - comfort, service, breakfast, cleanliness. We would definitely stay there again if having an overnight visit to that area. Kelly was particularly helpful and gracious.
reviews.title: Happy visit in Westmont

reviews.text: I've been traveling for business for many years and its such a relief to check into a hotel that has a staff eager to attend to every need. Periodically I've stayed at other hotels but I prefer Best Western. It has always been about customer service and the price has always been reasonable. With all the stress of business travel its nice to look forward to a stress less place to rest and re- energize.
reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised

reviews.text: We had a great stay.The staff was very helpful.We needed a map of the city and the staff went out of their way to find one for us.The decor was very nice and Kelly was very helpful.One of the best stays we've had.Slept like a baby.
reviews.title: Great Experience

reviews.text: All the employees I met were very friendly and knowledgeable. The hotel is older, but the rooms were very clean and the beds were comfortable. Great pillows! Pretty typical breakfast made special by the lady making omelets to order! My family thought we got a great value in this hotel.
reviews.title: Nice stay

reviews.text: I was sent to Chicago area for work. I was told about 2 weeks, but it turned into 6 months.I spent the whole time at this hotel. It was located central to my getting around the city from gurney in the north, to Matteson in the south and every town between.
reviews.title: Best experience in years

reviews.text: The management was very friendly and helpful when I asked for things, or just needed info on the city.
